channel.title: Cake on Tiny Human House
channel.description: Recent content in Cake on Tiny Human House

item.title: One Year of Mama
item.description: My baby is one year old. While obviously, this is a significant milestone for him - I’m trying to find a balance between telling my story, and not telling his. The often forgotten part of birthday’s are parents - and I know I never gave my parents much thought when I was growing up and it was my birthday. It was just me. Now I feel like I should have at least gotten my mom a card…
